official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers to transfer to New Hanover County, North Carolina, ownership of a surplus dredging vessel, known as the "Hyde hopper dredge".

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to transfer to New Hanover County, North Carolina, ownership of a surplus dredging vessel known as the "Hyde hopper dredge."

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers to transfer to New Hanover County, North Carolina, ownership of a surplus dredging vessel, known as the "Hyde hopper dredge".
